text: Langdon Park is a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station in Poplar in Greater London, England. The station is between All Saints and Devons Road stations on the Stratford-Lewisham Line. Construction of the station began on 17 November 2006. The first day of operation was 9 December 2007. ==References== Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: Langdon Park DLR station
